name: CockroachDB (cluster)
description: CockroachDB is a cloud-native distributed SQL database designed to build, scale, and manage modern, data-intensive applications.
CockroachDB supports the PostgreSQL wire protocol, so you can use any available PostgreSQL client drivers to connect from various languages.
This instance of CockroachDB is a three node cluster which requires a license (obtainable for free for hobby projects)
